level.heading: Rules and regulations - Revenue Act of 1956.
level.text: The Mayor is authorized to make rules and regulations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-131
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-131, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1801.04.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "This Act," referred to in this section, is 70 Stat. 71, ch. 154, approved March 31, 1956.
